alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 07 at 1:44PM CST until February 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County. Illinois River at Chewey affecting Delaware, Cherokee and Adair Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Illinois River at Chewey. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, no flooding occurs but all recreational floating along the Illinois River ceases due to strong turbulence. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.7 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
